Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
Animations = { LeftSwing = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("LeftSwing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 2, Duration = 0.75}, RightSwing = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("RightSwing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 2, Duration = 0.75}, KickHit = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("KickHit"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 1.5, Duration = 0.75}, ArmsUp = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("ArmsUp"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, ArmsOut = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("ArmsOut"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil} }
Sounds = { }
Damage = { Hit = 6, Swing = 16, }
SpecialAttacks = { Enabled = true, Active = false, ReloadTime = 5, Rise = { Damage = 15, ReloadTime = 60, Duration = 60, Enabled = true, Active = false, SkeletalRemains = { {Name = "HornedVelociraptorSkull", Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.75, 2.25), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=14028428", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=14027832", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "TriceratopsSkull", Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 3), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13157130", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13157137", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "RiddlingSkull", Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.75), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=4770583", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=4770560", Scale = Vector3.new(3.2, 3.2, 3.2), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "SkeletalTorsoRemains", Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.75), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780113", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=187949411", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "SkeletalRightArmRemains", Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 2, 0.5), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780156", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=187949411", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "SkeletalLeftArmRemains", Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 2, 0.5), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780032", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=187949411", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "SkeletalRightLegRemains", Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 2, 0.5), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780195", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=187949411", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)}, {Name = "SkeletalLeftLegRemains", Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 2, 0.5), MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780079", TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=187949411", Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)} } }, Uprise = { Radius = 25, Damage = 10, Duration = 15, ReloadTime = 45, Enabled = true, Active = false } }
ReloadTime = 0.25
Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false
Gravity = 196.20
ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then Activated() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" and SpecialAttacks.Enabled and not SpecialAttacks.Active then local Key = Value.Key local ByteKey = string.byte(Key) local Down = Value.Down if Key == "x" and Down then SpecialAttack = SpecialAttacks.Rise if SpecialAttack.Enabled then SpecialAttacks.Enabled = false SpecialAttacks.Active = true
SpecialAttack.Enabled = false SpecialAttack.Active = true
local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end)
local RayHit, RayPos = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2), {Character})
if RayHit and CurrentlyEquipped then local Animation = Animations.ArmsUp InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation)
local SkeletalRemainsPile = Instance.new("Model") SkeletalRemainsPile.Name = "SkeletalRemainsPile" local SpawnPosition = RayPos
Debris:AddItem(SkeletalRemainsPile, SpecialAttack.Duration) SkeletalRemainsPile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local CurrentPlayer = Player local CurrentCharacter = Character
local Parts = {} local SkeletalRemains = SpecialAttack.SkeletalRemains local Rows = 20 for i = 1, Rows do local NumberParts = (i * 1.25) local InsideRow = {} for ii = 1, NumberParts do local FillInParts = Round((i / 1), 0.5) for iii = 1, FillInParts do local Part = BasePart:Clone() local ObjectChosen = SkeletalRemains[math.random(1, #SkeletalRemains)] if i == 1 then --Make sure the top of the pile has a skull local SkeletonHeads = {SkeletalRemains[1], SkeletalRemains[2], SkeletalRemains[3]} ObjectChosen = SkeletonHeads[math.random(1, #SkeletonHeads)] end if (i > 12 and iii < (FillInParts - 10)) then table.insert(InsideRow, Part) else table.insert(Parts, Part) end if iii > (FillInParts - 3) then --Only make the outer layer of parts deadly Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local character = Hit.Parent if CurrentCharacter == character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, CurrentPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(SpecialAttack.Damage) end end) end Part.Name = ObjectChosen.Name Part.Size = ObjectChosen.Size Part.Anchored = true local AddFire = math.random(1, (Rows / 4)) if AddFire == 1 then local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) Fire.SecondaryColor = Fire.Color Fire.Heat = 9 Fire.Size = 5 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = Part end local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = ObjectChosen.MeshId Mesh.TextureId = ObjectChosen.TextureId Mesh.Scale = ObjectChosen.Scale Mesh.VertexColor = ObjectChosen.VertexColor Mesh.Parent = Part Part.Parent = SkeletalRemainsPile Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(SpawnPosition) + Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) * (i / 1) Part.CFrame = Part.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * ((i - 10) + 10) Part.CFrame = Part.CFrame + CFrame.Angles(0, math.random(-360, 360), 0).lookVector * iii Part.CFrame = Part.CFrame * ((i == 1 and CFrame.Angles(0, math.random(-360, 360), 0)) or (i > 1 and CFrame.Angles(math.random(-360, 360), math.random(-360, 360), math.random(-360, 360)))) Part.Parent = SkeletalRemainsPile end end for ii, vv in pairs(InsideRow) do if vv and vv.Parent then vv:Destroy() end end for ii = 1, 10 do for iii, vvv in pairs(Parts) do if vvv and vvv.Parent then vvv.CFrame = vvv.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, (1 / 10), 0) end end wait(0.0001) end end
if CurrentlyEquipped then InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animation) end
if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end
end
SpecialAttack.Active = false SpecialAttacks.Active = false
Delay(((RayHit and SpecialAttack.ReloadTime) or 0), function() SpecialAttack.Enabled = true end) end elseif Key == "v" and Down then SpecialAttack = SpecialAttacks.Uprise if SpecialAttack.Enabled then SpecialAttacks.Enabled = false SpecialAttacks.Active = true
SpecialAttack.Enabled = false SpecialAttack.Active = true
local character = Character local humanoid = Humanoid local torso = Torso
local Animation = Animations.ArmsOut InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation)
local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end)
local RayHit, RayPos = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2), {Character})
if RayHit and CurrentlyEquipped then local PortalPart = BasePart:Clone() PortalPart.Name = "PortalPart" PortalPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really black") PortalPart.Size = Vector3.new((SpecialAttack.Radius * 2), 0.2, (SpecialAttack.Radius * 2)) PortalPart.Anchored = true PortalPart.CanCollide = false local CylinderMesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") CylinderMesh.Parent = PortalPart Debris:AddItem(PortalPart, SpecialAttack.Duration) PortalPart.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") PortalPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(RayPos)
local StartTick = tick() local SkeletalRemains = SpecialAttacks.Rise.SkeletalRemains local SkeletonHeads = {SkeletalRemains[1], SkeletalRemains[2], SkeletalRemains[3]} local CurrentPlayer = Player local CurrentCharacter = Character while (tick() - StartTick) < SpecialAttack.Duration and PortalPart and PortalPart.Parent and CheckIfAlive() and ToolEquipped do Spawn(function() for i = 1, 10 do local ObjectChosen = SkeletonHeads[math.random(1, #SkeletonHeads)] local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition") local Part = BasePart:Clone() Part.Name = ObjectChosen.Name Part.Size = (ObjectChosen.Size * 1.5) Part.Anchored = false Part.CanCollide = false Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local character = Hit.Parent if CurrentCharacter == character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, CurrentPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(SpecialAttack.Damage) end end) local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) Fire.SecondaryColor = Fire.Color Fire.Heat = 9 Fire.Size = 5 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = Part local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = ObjectChosen.MeshId Mesh.TextureId = ObjectChosen.TextureId Mesh.Scale = ObjectChosen.Scale Mesh.VertexColor = ObjectChosen.VertexColor Mesh.Parent = Part local Mass = (Part:GetMass() * Gravity * 100) local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = Part local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * math.random(150, 200) BodyVelocity.Parent = Part Debris:AddItem(Part, 3) Part.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Part.CFrame = PortalPart.CFrame + (PortalPart.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.random(-360, 360), 0)).lookVector * (math.random(-(SpecialAttack.Radius * 1000), (SpecialAttack.Radius * 1000)) * 0.001) Part.CFrame = Part.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.random(-360, 360), 0) BodyGyro.cframe = Part.CFrame wait(math.random(0, 0.35)) end end) wait(0.5) end
if CurrentlyEquipped then InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animation) end
if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end
end
SpecialAttack.Active = false SpecialAttacks.Active = false
Delay(((RayHit and SpecialAttack.ReloadTime) or 0), function() SpecialAttack.Enabled = true end)
end end if SpecialAttack then wait(SpecialAttacks.ReloadTime) SpecialAttacks.Enabled = true end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function Round(Number, RoundDecimal) local WholeNumber, Decimal = math.modf(Number) return ((Decimal >= RoundDecimal and math.ceil(Number)) or (Decimal < RoundDecimal and math.floor(Number))) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not ToolEquipped or SpecialAttacks.Active then return end Clicks = (Clicks + 1) if not FirstClick then FirstClick = true local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) wait(0.15) if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end Tool.Enabled = false if Clicks == 1 then local SwingAnimations = {Animations.LeftSwing, Animations.RightSwing} local Animation = SwingAnimations[math.random(1, #SwingAnimations)] AnimationChosen = Animation InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", AnimationChosen) wait(AnimationChosen.Duration) if CurrentlyEquipped then -- InvokeClient("StopAnimation", AnimationChosen) end AnimationChosen = nil wait(ReloadTime) elseif Clicks > 1 then local Animation = Animations.KickHit InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) wait(Animation.Duration / 4) local SkeletalRemains = SpecialAttacks.Rise.SkeletalRemains local SkeletonHeads = {SkeletalRemains[1], SkeletalRemains[2], SkeletalRemains[3]} local ObjectChosen = SkeletonHeads[math.random(1, #SkeletonHeads)] local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition") local Part = BasePart:Clone() Part.Name = ObjectChosen.Name Part.Size = ObjectChosen.Size Part.Anchored = false Part.CanCollide = false local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) Fire.SecondaryColor = Fire.Color Fire.Heat = 9 Fire.Size = 5 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = Part local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = ObjectChosen.MeshId Mesh.TextureId = ObjectChosen.TextureId Mesh.Scale = ObjectChosen.Scale Mesh.VertexColor = ObjectChosen.VertexColor Mesh.Parent = Part local Mass = (Part:GetMass() * Gravity) local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = Part local BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new((Mass * 100), (Mass * 100), (Mass * 100)) BodyPosition.position = (Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (Part.Size.Z / 2)) + 0.5)).p BodyPosition.Parent = Part local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = Part Debris:AddItem(Part, 5) Part.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local OriginalCFrame = Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (Part.Size.Z / 2)) + 0.5) Part.CFrame = OriginalCFrame local Direction = CFrame.new(Part.Position, MousePosition) Part.CFrame = Direction BodyGyro.cframe = Direction Part.CFrame = Part.CFrame + (Part.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0)).lookVector * (Torso.Size.Y * 1) BodyPosition.position = Part.CFrame.p Part.CanCollide = true wait(Animation.Duration / 2) BodyPosition.position = OriginalCFrame.p local Velocity = CFrame.new(Part.Position, MousePosition).lookVector * 200 wait(Animation.Duration / 4) local CurrentPlayer = Player local CurrentCharacter = Character Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent and Hit == Handle then return end local character = Hit.Parent if CurrentCharacter == character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, CurrentPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(25) end end) if CurrentlyEquipped then -- InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animation) end BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Velocity Part.Velocity = Velocity end FirstClick = false Clicks = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Blow(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not CheckIfAlive() then return end local character = Hit.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if character == Character or not humanoid or humanoid.Health == 0 then return end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip or not (RightGrip.Part0 == Handle or RightGrip.Part1 == Handle) then return end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage((AnimationChosen and Damage.Swing) or Damage.Hit) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end local CurrentlyEquipped = true EquippedToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) if EquippedToolUnequipped then EquippedToolUnequipped:disconnect() end if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.Animation then InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end end ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() FirstClick = false Clicks = 0 for i, v in pairs({EquippedToolUnequipped, ToolUnequipped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end for i ,v in pairs(Sounds) do InvokeClient("StopSound", v) v:Stop() end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end ToolEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
Equipped = false
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Equipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Equipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
